My proficiency in developing scalable architectures is complemented by strong expertise in **Docker**, CI/CD pipelines, and data processing. I am adept at model inference and have a solid understanding of machine learning principles, including **ML** and **NLP** techniques.

My experience spans full-stack development with modern technologies such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, as well as managing microservices architectures and event-driven systems.
